mapper.select: SELECT tb_member.mem_seq, tb_member.mem_gender, tb_member.mem_birth, tb_body.body_weight, tb_body.body_height, CASE WHEN tb_member.mem_gender = 'M' THEN 66.5 + (13.75 * tb_body.body_weight) + (5 * tb_body.body_height) - (6.75 * (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) - YEAR(tb_member.mem_birth))) WHEN tb_member.mem_gender = 'W' THEN 655.1 + (9.563 * tb_body.body_weight) + (1.85 * tb_body.body_height) - (4.68 * (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) - YEAR(tb_member.mem_birth))) ELSE NULL END AS "body_base" FROM tb_member LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_body ON tb_member.mem_seq = tb_body.mem_seq WHERE tb_member.mem_seq = #{mem_seq}
